xml.data:
Home » 39P5 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5) » 1 Kusalattika, Tika » 1.8 Kusalattika, Dassanahetukattika » 1.8.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Kusalattika, Tika
Kusalattika, Dassanahetukattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
41.
126Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
127Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
42.
128Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
129Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
43.
130Kusalaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
131Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
